title: Signalgate, Auto Tariffs, and Trump's Crypto Empire
summary:
Kara and Scott jump right in to discuss all things Signalgate — will heads roll? Then, President Trump has announced a 25% tariff on imported cars, the Trump family announces plans for a stablecoin, and Megyn Kelly is launching a podcast network. Plus, stay tuned for Scott’s prediction on who will fill the leadership void left by the chaos of the Trump administration.

Follow us on Instagram and Threads at @pivotpodcastofficial.
